## Shape.AnchorType property

获取和设置形状锚占位符。

```csharp
public ShapeAnchorType AnchorType { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.AnchorType == ShapeAnchorType.OneCellAnchor)
    shape.AnchorType = ShapeAnchorType.TwoCellAnchor;
```
